meanings.definition: The quality or state of being straightforward or honest.
meanings.sent1: Her downrightness in telling the truth always impressed others.
meanings.sent2: I appreciate the downrightness of his answers during the interview.
meanings.sent3: His downrightness in admitting he ate the last cookie was both surprising and refreshing.
meanings.sent4: The downrightness of her gaze made it clear she was not one to be deceived easily.
meanings.sent5: The downrightness of his apology showed true sincerity and integrity.

meanings.definition: The act of being direct or blunt in speech or behavior.
meanings.sent1: The downrightness of his criticism caught everyone off guard.
meanings.sent2: Sometimes a little downrightness is necessary to get your point across.
meanings.sent3: His downrightness in asking for a raise made his boss chuckle.
meanings.sent4: The downrightness of her refusal left no room for negotiation.
meanings.sent5: Her downrightness in expressing her feelings made the conversation uncomfortable but honest.
